function.name: strcat
function.description: Append two strings passed as arguments. Concatenated string stored in 1st string. Returns pointer to cancatenated string.

function.name: strchr
function.description: Scans string in forward direction for the 1st occurrence of a character in a string. On success, returns the pointer to the 1st occurrence of the character. On failure, reutns null.

function.name: strcmp
function.description: Compares two strings. Return value- < 0 if 1st < 2nd, == 0 if 1st == 2nd, > 0 if 1st > 2nd
